characteristics: Earthy and floral with an element of citrus
storability: Retains 60%-65% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20 degrees C
resistant_to: Resistant to prunus necrotic ring-spot virus, downy mildew and verticillium wilt
style_guide: Extra Special Bitter, Barley Wine, Imperial Stout
substitutes: Chinook, Galena, Nugget, Zeus, Columbus, Cascade
name: Centennial
